Card.Name: Palinchron
Card.RulesText: Flying When Palinchron enters the battlefield, untap up to seven lands. {2}{U}{U}: Return Palinchron to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Arcane Denial
Card.RulesText: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

Card.Name: Brainstorm
Card.RulesText: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

Card.Name: Force of Will
Card.RulesText: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

Card.Name: Frantic Search
Card.RulesText: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.

Card.Name: High Tide
Card.RulesText: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps an Island for mana, that player adds an additional {U}.

Card.Name: Impulse
Card.RulesText: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Card.Name: Merchant Scroll
Card.RulesText: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Mystical Tutor
Card.RulesText: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

Card.Name: Time Spiral
Card.RulesText: Exile Time Spiral. Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. You untap up to six lands.

Card.Name: Turnabout
Card.RulesText: Choose artifact, creature, or land. Tap all untapped permanents of the chosen type target player controls, or untap all tapped permanents of that type that player controls.

Card.Name: Thawing Glaciers
Card.RulesText: Thawing Glaciers enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Return Thawing Glaciers to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
